notes:
[Prairie Stream] is the money pick. The Battlelands continue to enable the four and five colour monstrosities in standard and will continue to do so at least until the Khans fetches rotate.

Other than that [Retreat to Emeria] is one of the best uncommons in white and gets the edge over [Clutch of Currents] because any deck where the games go event a little long you can get really good value out of the Retreat.
